title: Winter haiku module + tests
description: Create `src/haiku_winter.py` exporting `get_haiku()` that returns a list of exactly 3 non-empty strings (a haiku about winter). Create `tests/test_haiku_winter.py` that imports `tests.bootstrap`, imports `haiku_winter`, calls `get_haiku()`, and asserts: result is a list, length is 3, each line is a non-empty string, and at least one line contains the substring "winter" (case-insensitive). Update `prd.json` (done=true, notes) and append an entry to `progress.txt`.
validation: python -m unittest tests.test_haiku_winter && python -m unittest discover -s tests
